message: I've no doubt that Uncharted 3 is going to be better than Gears 3, but when it comes to Game of the Year, inFamous 2, Journey and Batman are all smiling at Drake and saying "lol".
We know who has the most expensive car, but who will make the third-person shooter that will be game of the year 2011? For what it's worth, I'm in Drake's corner.

Also, you're working on the assumption that Darric is good at his new job. Which we don't know for sure.

:P
Knowing Darric he'll being some kind of Rockband mini-game element into the game. I just can't back Uncharted 3.

With no Last Guardian, Uncharted 3 is a shoo-in for non-niche GotY.

I have faith in Naughty Dog.  Not even Neilan ought to be able to muck that up.
(Of course, really, Uncharted 3 is totally going to take it.)

Taking Uncharted 3 out of the equation and commenting on the matter objectively though, I don't see Journey as a real contender because it seems so niche. With Mass Effect 3 out of the way (huzzah), I'd personally put it as a toss up between Arkham City and Skyrim. I don't really see Gears 3 in the running, to be honest.
